-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Amazon Web Services (AWS) Signature v4 HTTP request signer
--   
--   Functions to sign AWS requests with the AWS Signature-V4 protocol
--   (required for the Elastic Transcoder service)
@package aws-sign4
@version 1.1.0.1

module Aws.Sign4

-- | Signature v4 generator parameters
data Sign4
Sign4 :: Credentials -> UTCTime -> ByteString -> ByteString -> Method -> ByteString -> RequestHeaders -> Query -> ByteString -> Maybe ByteString -> Maybe ByteString -> Sign4

-- | AWS credentials used to sign the request
s4Credentials :: Sign4 -> Credentials

-- | date/time stamp for request
s4Date :: Sign4 -> UTCTime

-- | service id: <a>ets</a> for Elastic Transcode
s4Endpoint :: Sign4 -> ByteString

-- | service id: ets =&gt; Elastic Transcode
s4Service :: Sign4 -> ByteString

-- | HTTP request method
s4Method :: Sign4 -> Method

-- | URI path component (excluding host &amp; query)
s4Path :: Sign4 -> ByteString

-- | The request headers
s4Headers :: Sign4 -> RequestHeaders

-- | Parsed query string information
s4Query :: Sign4 -> Query

-- | Body of request
s4Body :: Sign4 -> ByteString

-- | Signed headers (internally calculated)
s4SgndHeaders :: Sign4 -> Maybe ByteString

-- | Canonical headers (internally calculated)
s4CnclHeaders :: Sign4 -> Maybe ByteString

-- | Generate authorization header (s4Authz) and intermediate steps for
--   diagnostics and validation (s4StringToSign,s4canonicalRequest) from
--   the Sign4 parameters.
s4Authz :: Sign4 -> ByteString

-- | Generate authorization header (s4Authz) and intermediate steps for
--   diagnostics and validation (s4StringToSign,s4canonicalRequest) from
--   the Sign4 parameters.
s4StringToSign :: Sign4 -> ByteString

-- | Generate authorization header (s4Authz) and intermediate steps for
--   diagnostics and validation (s4StringToSign,s4canonicalRequest) from
--   the Sign4 parameters.
s4CanonicalRequest :: Sign4 -> ByteString
iso8601BasicUtcDate :: String
instance Typeable Sign4
